cont.entity_a: Insufficient product information for non-technical users.
Included software is not user-friendly for non-technical users.
cont.entity_b: Better performance when letting Windows control the connection instead of Netgear's software.

cont.entity_a: Windows 10 updates filled storage memory, rendering it unusable.
Good performance for Linux-based laptops, supporting WPA and WEP with easy connections. Better performance than a more expensive USB N adaptor.
cont.entity_b: Range and speed are inadequate. Speed and coverage are as advertised.

cont.entity_a: Signal drops significantly beyond 40 feet. Signal reception is good throughout a two-story house. Signal strength is not always full but remains connected. Easy setup with good signal throughout the house.
cont.entity_b: Works well with the Rangemax router, maintaining a stable connection.

cont.entity_a: Delivery was fast and product arrived in perfect condition.
Installation instructions available online were helpful.
cont.entity_b: Installation was easy and took less than 10 minutes. Installation was easy and smooth, with improved sensitivity compared to previous cards.

cont.entity_a: Price was low, but the product worked as expected.
Troubleshooting may be needed for address conflicts on networks.
cont.entity_b: Setup was problematic due to wrong IP address issues.

cont.entity_a: Reliable and dependable for providing wireless connectivity.
Does not work with secure recent routers. Requires specific drivers for Windows; not supported under Linux without additional setup. Drivers not available for Texas Instruments CardBus Controllers.
Older version of the card; no technical support available. Seller was helpful and quick to refund for a faulty product.
Installation is easy, but speed is a concern for older laptops.
cont.entity_b: Speed and coverage are as advertised.

cont.entity_a: Setup was straightforward with provided software. Linksys support site provides drivers if needed.
cont.entity_b: Setup was easy with an on-screen wizard.
CPU usage spikes to 80% when the card is plugged in.
